greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n)=0 if n is in the infinite trunk of Carl White's beanstalk (i.e., in A179016), otherwise 1 + number of steps to reach the farthest leaf in that finite branch of the beanstalk.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..16384
program: (Scheme with memoization-macro definec): (definec (A213725 n) (cond ((zero? (A079559 n)) 1) ((not (zero? (A213719 n))) 0) (else (1+ (max (A213725 (A213723 n)) (A213725 (A213724 n)))))))
xref: Differs from A213726 for the first time at n=208, where a(n)=5, while A213726(208)=6.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 01 2012
